_header: Jesu Christ I beseech Thee for the cleanness of Thine incarnation

CamMag13.First Lines:
Ihesu cryste I beseche the for the clennes of thyn IncarnacionAnd
                    for the merites of thy woundes & of thy passion…
CamMag13.Last Lines:
…ffrom the feendis pouer & from euerlastyng dampnacionAnd
                    bringe vs to the blysse where we may haue ioye of thy glorious
                    ascencion
CamMag13.Note:
11 lines. In this MS only six lines rhyme, monorhyming, then changes to
                    prose.
